Rulings.Tengu:
● You cannot use Fluff Tokens for a Tribute Set.
● You cannot declare the name of a token with “Prohibition”.
● In Edison, trigger effects can activate anywhere. If this card is discarded for, and then added to the hand by,  “Monster Reincarnation”, its effect activates in the hand.
